1.0.name: wordpress/lightweight-personal
1.0.description: Responsive, HTML5 and CSS3, light, widgetized sidebar and footer, translation ready, SEO friendly WordPress theme with stylish design. Perfect for personal blog. Possible to use custom header and footer menu.
